edu.xtec.jclic.boxes

Class TextGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
          • edu.xtec.jclic.boxes.AbstractBox
            • edu.xtec.jclic.boxes.TextGrid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resizable, ActionListener, Shape, Serializable, Cloneable, EventListener

    public class TextGrid
extends AbstractBox
implements Cloneable, Resizable, ActionListener
    This class is a special AbstractBox that displays a grid of single characters. It is used in activities like crosswords and scrambled letters.
    Version:
    13.08.08
    Author:
    Francesc Busquets (fbusquets@xtec.cat)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
